thread.title: Ed Sheeran had the time of his life hosting the MTV Europe Music Awards - and viewers loved his antics
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran had the time of his life hosting the MTV Europe Music Awards - and viewers loved his antics

title: Ed Sheeran had the time of his life hosting the MTV Europe Music Awards - and viewers loved his antics
text:
Events Ed Sheeran had the time of his life hosting the MTV Europe Music Awards - and viewers loved his antics Ed Sheeran had the time of his life hosting the MTV Europe Music Awards - and viewers loved his antics 
Press Association 2014 / / National Entertainment News Share 
Ed Sheeran had absolutely the best time hosting the MTV Europe Music Awards alongside co-host Ruby Rose in Milan. 
The 24-year-old Brit chatted away, cracked jokes, won two awards, and performed Lay It All On Me with Rudimental – and he looked beyond psyched about it all. 
Here’s how his evening went down. 
He won an award. Well, two, actually – best live act, and best world stage for his performance at V Festival in 2014. Funny how @Edsheeran won Best Live while hosting the #MTVEMA …live. https://t.co/udfOxvfOUD 
— MTV EMA (@mtvema) October 25, 2015 Thank you for the two EMA awards yep 
— Ed Sheeran (@edsheeran) October 25, 2015 
He threw a banana, for some reason. Apparently it was a magic trick… or something.
